evidence.claim: No specific APIs or cloud services mentioned on OCS site.
OCS does not provide explicit health-tech compliance information.
The company website lacks information about integration patterns or middleware used.
No cloud service references are found within the site's engineering career section.
There is no mention of any specific EHRs, clearinghouses, or health transaction sets on their site.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of handling X12 transactions or API-based healthcare data exchange found.
